node.title: 'He drove straight into those kids': Two children dead in Flordia after car ploughs into group of children
node.description: A manhunt for the driver is underway.
node.content: ["Two children are dead and three injured after a person drove their car into them in the Florida city of Wilton Manors.\n", "The incident happened at about 2:50pm on Monday (local time).", "\"I don't know if he couldn't control the car because he was going fast, but he drove straight into those kids,\" bus driver and witness Selvin Arjun told CBS Miami.", "The Wilton Manors government office confirmed the victims appeared to be children.", "\"Our thoughts and condolences are with their families,\" it said on Twitter.", "\"While the Broward Sheriff's Office is leading the investigation, our city & police dept are doing everything we can to support them.\"", "According to CBS, the sheriff's office is still hunting for the alleged hit-and-run driver.\u00a0"]
